channel.title: creative commons on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan
channel.description: Recent content in creative commons on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan

item.title: About…
item.description: Welcome to my blog, d2h.net. Here you will stuff that I find interesting, useful, or noteworthy for some reason or other — in short, stuff the cat dragged in, or the sea delivered to our doorsteps. This blog is built using hugo, emacs, a derivative of the smigle hugo theme, the computer modern typewriter font, and the special elite typewriter font, and is hosted via github. Responsible contact:

item.title: the joys of creative commons licenses
item.description: i’m in the process of re-working both this blog and my photo site. for the photo site i’ve switched from zenphoto to jalbum — zenphoto didn’t really offer any decent support for displaying geo-tagged pictures, had at the point in time of switching too many security issues for my taste, and didn’t have such a slick looking theme as jalbum’s turtle skin. for a couple of sub-albums i wanted to make use of the background music feature offered by the turtle skin.
